her_sup_p: Book your next trip with best prices
hero_p: Search, find and book your next trip with affordable prices; Check flights, bus and train tickets from anywhere in Egypt, start now and book your next trip
footer_tip: Book cheap trips on out partnats and you’re ready to go
about_heading: Discover the real value of travel with Ticket Route
about_desc: Find, search for, and reserve a cheap flight for your upcoming vacation; Start today and plan your next travel by checking tickets for buses, trains, and flights from anywhere in Egypt.
why_desc: We are on a mission to help people discover the real value of travel to inspire to give more reasons  to make it easy for you to go.Our company was founded back in 2023 and since then we have imagined and created some of the most wellloved products for travelers all around the world.Today Ticket Route is used by millions of people every month — people who travel for adventure for work for family and for many other reasons. That is why we work tirelessly to make your experience of planning & booking flights hotels and trips as seamless as possible.Ticket Route is more than just an app a website or a company. Ticket Route is an idea and belief that everyone has an innate desire and yearning to travel — to experience to live and to grow. So ingrained is this idea of the human need to travel that we have woven this emotional and eternal question of “why we go ?” into the name of our organization — Ticket Route
mission_desc: We firmly believe that by helping people travel more, explore the world and experience diversity, we create a meaningful socio-economic impact.
quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one’s lifetime.
value1_desc: We pride ourselves on being both explorers and geeks
value2_desc: Advancement based on achievement and attitude not tenure or pedigree
value3_desc: We want to be the world’s best at what we do, not just local champions
value4_desc: Seeking to reach 30 nationalities (out of about 300 employees!)
question1: How can users reserve their tickets in the system?
answer1: Users can reserve their tickets by logging into the system, selecting the desired event or destination, choosing the date and time, and completing the payment process.
question2: What information should be collected from users during the reservation process?
answer2: During the reservation process, it is essential to collect the user's name, contact information (email/phone number), preferred seat or ticket type, and any additional preferences or requirements.
question3: How can users cancel or modify their ticket reservations?
answer3: Users can cancel or modify their ticket reservations by accessing their account or reservation history on the system's website or app. They can select the specific reservation they want to modify or cancel and follow the provided options.
question4: How can the system prevent double bookings or overbooking?
answer4: To prevent double bookings or overbooking, the system can implement a real-time inventory management system that updates seat availability instantly. When a user selects a seat or ticket, it is temporarily reserved for a specific time window. If the reservation is not completed within that time, the seat becomes available again.
question5: How can users receive their tickets after making a reservation?
answer5: After making a reservation, users can receive their tickets through various methods. This can include email delivery, SMS or mobile app notifications, or by printing the tickets at a physical ticket booth or self-service kiosk using a unique reservation code or QR code.
